mapper.select: select c.no, c.name, c.description, c.blog_id as blogId, count(p.no) as count from category c left join post p on p.category_no = c.no where c.blog_id= #{id} group by c.no order by c.no asc
select no from category where name = #{category}
select no from category where blog_id = #{id} order by no limit 1
select count(no) as count from category where no = #{categoryNo}
mapper.delete: delete from category where no = #{no} and blog_id = #{blogId}
